org.itsnat.core.event

Interface ItsNatEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ItsNatUserData
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ItsNatAsyncTaskEvent, ItsNatAttachedClientCometEvent, ItsNatAttachedClientEvent, ItsNatAttachedClientTimerEvent, ItsNatCometEvent, ItsNatContinueEvent, ItsNatDOMExtEvent, ItsNatDOMStdEvent, ItsNatKeyEvent, ItsNatNormalEvent, ItsNatTimerEvent, ItsNatUserEvent

    public interface ItsNatEvent
extends ItsNatUserData
    This interface is the parent of any ItsNat event interface: normal and remote view/control events.

    Any org.w3c.dom.events.Event object managed by ItsNat implements this interface.

    Current implementation inherits from java.util.EventObject.

    Author:
    Jose Maria Arranz Santamaria

        ClientDocument getClientDocument()
        Returns the associated client document target of this event.
        Returns:

        See Also:

        int getCommMode()
        Returns the communication mode used to send this event.
        Returns:
        the communication mode.

      • getExtraParam

        java.lang.Object getExtraParam(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the remote value carried alongside this event with the specified name.

        Usually these name/value pairs are declared using ParamTransport objects.

        Current implementation calls: ServletRequest.getParameter(String) with the specified name if the name/value pair was not set calling setExtraParam(String,Object).

        Parameters:
        name - the name to search for.
        Returns:
        the value carried with the specified name.

      • setExtraParam

        void setExtraParam(java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.Object value)
        Sets the specified name and value as a remote browser data carried by this event.

        This method may be useful to simulate data transportation from the browser in an event directly (locally) dispatched to the server DOM calling ItsNatDocument.dispatchEventLocally(EventTarget,Event).

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the value.
        value - the value associated the specified name.

      • getItsNatEventListenerChain

        ItsNatEventListenerChain getItsNatEventListenerChain()
        Returns the event listener chain flow control object associated to this event.
        Returns:
        the listener flow control object of this event. May be null if this capability is not enabled for this type of event or this event is no longer valid.
